delivery_status.name: Quota
delivery_status.regex: inbox is full|Quota\s+excedida|Mailbox size limit exceeded|File too large|error\s+writing\s+to\s+mailbox|Quota insuficiente|Over\s+quota|Status: 5\.2\.2|A caixa de e-mail esta lotada|exceeded storage allocation|Mailbox has exceeded the limit|ACIMA DA QUOTA DE RECEBIMENTO|Too Many Messages in Folde|Quota exceeded|Mailbox full|Quota exceeded while writing|mailbox is full|maildir over quota|Disk quota exceeded|No space left on device|Over quota|disk quota exceeded

delivery_status.name: Erro temporário
delivery_status.regex: message is looping|system config error|Message probably in a routing loop|Temporary error|This could indicate a mail loop|This account has been temporarily suspended|Sender domain must exist|Your domain has no DNS|Message\s+temporarily\s+deferred|Temporary local problem|Network\s+is\s+unreachable|Connection\s+timeout|timed out|Resources\s+temporarily\s+not\s+available|Resources temporarily unavailable|421 trouble resolving DNS|451 time out|Temporary server busy|554 Backend Replied|delivery temporarily suspended: lost connection|Connection\s+timed\s+out|Delivery expired|excessive recursion|mail transport unavailable|loops back to myself|error writing to mailbox|Syntax error in parameters or arguments|mail forwarding loop|Broken pipe|timeout exceeded|disabled or discontinued|email account that you tried to reach is disabled|Operation timed|delivery time expired|lost connection with|Delivery to the following recipient has been delayed

delivery_status.name: Domínio não existente
delivery_status.regex: not have any MX records|domain may not exist|domain doesn't exist|553 PTR nao configurado para esse IP|invalid\s+address|NEW DOMAIN|dominio nao existe ou esta desativado|Domain change|Unrouteable address|Host unknown|Malformed or unexpected name server reply|Host or domain name not found|unable to connect successfully to the destination mail server

delivery_status.name: Email rejeitado
delivery_status.regex: has\s+been\s+rejected|Reject,.*SPAM|Message content rejected|message was rejected|foi classificado como SPAM|not permitted to relay|Invalid\s+sender\s+address|Access from ip .* blocked|spam score exceeded|Administrative prohibition|looks like spam|Spam detected|Relay\s+denied|Email Rejeitado|authentication\s+needed|Challenge Response|MAV BL|foi considerado SPAM|failed to meet SPF requirements|SMTP authentication is required|o solicitado ou spam|Detectado como SPAM|MENSAGEM CLASSIFICADA COMO SPAM|553 MAV 4\.3 - SPAM|Email aparentemente nao solicitado|Local Policy Violation|Status: 5\.7\.1|Seu remetente foi bloqueado em nosso servidor|consider the message to be spam|Mail restricted from this address|domain's blacklist|SERVER IS TO BE USED WITH AUTHENTICATION|The IP .+ is Blacklisted|as a relay, but I have not been configured|Relay negado|Message cannot be sent - requested by server extension|Relaying denied|Need Recipient|Sender Denied|considered spam|spam rejection|not our customer|REJECT_IP\.html|X-IronPort-Anti-Spam-Result|my list of allowed rcpthosts|Mail appears to be unsolicited|This system is not configured to relay mail|SPAM \(in reply to RCPT TO command\)|Message rejected as spam|Mail rejected by|content with spam-like characteristics|is neither permitted nor denied by best guess record for domain of|Unable to relay|that domain isn't in my list of allowed rcpthosts|server permanently rejected message|Relay access denied|Policy Rejection|refused|Your email is considered spamrejected as spam

delivery_status.name: Usuário inexistente
delivery_status.regex: Nao existe uma caixa|does not specify a valid Notes mail|Account is not local|reach does not exist
